segments.text: I'm going to need a taxi .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don't have to restrict yourself to a taxi . We can offer you a private vehicle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A private vehicle , huh ? No , a taxi is okay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some people find a limo to be much more comfortable than a taxi .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I wouldn't be caught dead in a limo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No upgrade of any kind . And where might you be going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When shall I tell the taxi to be here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The taxi will be here immediately , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , I'm leaving my room in about one minute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You won't have to wait a second , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
